dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Halt! You dare trespass the domain of the Rock Guardian, puny mortal. State your purpose before my wrath befalls upon you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come in peace, seeking knowledge and wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Knowledge and wisdom? Your kind knows nothing of such virtues. Begone or suffer the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We mean no harm, we will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your feeble attempts to deceive me are in vain. I see through your facade. Leave now before I crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, we will retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. Begone from my sight, and do not return, lest you face true destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not back down!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to face the wrath of the Rock Guardian!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek an alliance with the mighty Rock Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? Ha! Your race is too feeble to be considered as an ally to the likes of me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will prove our worth to you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortals. I have no interest in your worthless attempts. Leave now

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will leave, respecting your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Leave now before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We challenge you to a battle of strength and wit!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Bold words from such weak beings. Very well, let us see if you can survive my might.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself for defeat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defeat? The only defeat here will be yours. Face the consequences of your foolishness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not engage in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowards! I expected as much from your kind. Leave before I lose my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come to challenge the Rock Guardian and prove our strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge me? Mortals have grown more foolish than I thought. You will regret your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek to test our abilities against your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your abilities are nothing compared to the might of the Rock Guardian. Prepare to face your defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not back down!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Face the consequences of your arrogance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There will be no peace as long as you challenge me. Face your punishment!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We apologize for the misunderstanding, we will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies will not save you now. Prepare to face the wrath of the Rock Guardian.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Leave now, and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will stand and fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insignificant creatures. Prepare for your final moments.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek to learn from the legendary Rock Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learn from me? Mortals like you seek knowledge but lack the capacity to understand. Leave before I lose my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will leave, respecting your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Leave now before my wrath is unleashed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We challenge you to a battle of wits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle of wits? You are clearly outmatched. Prepare for your defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We apologize for any offense, we will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies are meaningless. Leave now, and do not return.
